posts.post_content:
Looking to purchase or trade for Chief Meyers Colored S74 silks. I'll pay very strong prices for nice examples.


Thanks in advance,


Patrick

posts.post_title: Looking for color combinations I don't have
posts.post_content:
I was able to pickup this rasberry colored Chief Meyers S74 Silk recently. 

I will pay strong for color combinations that I have yet to acquire.

Here is a link to the colors I have presently:

[url]http://home.myfairpoint.net/vintagecatcher/thevintagecatcher/id107.html[/url]


Thanks,
